title: ICE: Encountered early bound region when generalizing: ReEarlyBound(TypeSpace, 0, 'a)

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
Code:

``` rust
#![feature(associated_consts)]

use std::marker::PhantomData;

trait Tr<'a> {
    const C: PhantomData<&'a u8> = PhantomData::<&'a u8>;
}

fn main() {}
```

ICEs on nightly (1.12), can't be reproduced on stable/beta due to `#![feature(associated_consts)]`

Backtrace:
